data.why:
I have a couple of things that I have had for a while, first will
    be: Math::Expression.pm, this compiles & evaluates expressions. The
    reason that I wrote it was to make config files simpler: just
    evaluate an expression that yeilds a config value (like a date
    dependent file name).

    I also have whole Program logging subsystem implemented in Perl, C
    and shell.
